revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}}
'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static Vector2 '''GetTextScreenSize'''()
== Usage == Can be used to get the actual resolution of the intermission screen. This is usually much lower than the screen's resolution.
=== Return value === Returns the width in the x value and height in the y value of the intermission screen.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Screen]]
